text: I feel for the cops in there though they were so unprepared and underequipped

text:
underequipped cops is unusual for the US, no?
My understanding of US police is they are generally massively overequipt.

Like the _Keene Police_ Department’s armoured troup carrier they needed to protect their pumpkin festival

text: It's not weird when you know who's in charge of the police in Washington D.C.: it's the _Minister of Defense_, another Trump stooge that _denied_ Washington D.C.'s mayor's repeated requests to get enough well-equipped people to protect the Capitol on that date. In other words, this was premeditated.
